description: Defines a reusable Flutter widget named OceanGradientHeader, which displays a header with a blue-to-gray gradient background, rounded bottom corners, and optional trailing widget.

classes.name: OceanGradientHeader
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a header with a customized gradient background, rounded bottom corners, and optional trailing widget.

methods.name: OceanGradientHeader
methods.description: Constructor for OceanGradientHeader, requires a title and optionally a trailing widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the header, applying styles and layout.
